result.post: strain FO12 and different pathogenic Verticillium species were obtained. We have identified VOCs,
result.name: binomial

result.name: binomial

result.post: to VOCs from FO12 resulted in a significant inhibition of mycelial growth in both pathogens. These
result.name: binomial
